t = int(raw_input())
for ii in range(t):
    e={}
    ans=0
    c={'+':1,'-':-1}
    n=int(raw_input())
    for z in range(n):
        a=raw_input().split()
        name=a[0]
        vote=a[1]
        if(name in e):
            if(e[name]=='+'):
                ans=ans-1
            if(e[name]=='-'):
                ans=ans+1
            ans=ans+c[vote]
            e[name]=vote

        else:
            ans=ans+c[vote]
            e[name]=vote
    print ans
